channel.title: Customs
channel.description: :confused: I was tought to add customs into the models folder, then put the ints into class 8. I downloaded the Games Pvp source and the owner lost his client, so he said use bluurs. He gave the link to his models, and i downloaded them. they're all ****.dat files. No ints.... How do i add it to bluurs client? Was he just being stupid ? Do i rly need ints lol?

item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Tony-Scape Owner Tony-Scape
item.description:
@Owner_Tony-Scape wrote:

and also if it is a npc model, you put it in class5.java, and if it is an item than it is sopossed to be in class8.java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2009, 04:33:38 pm[/size][hr]and this should be in Models Requests/Help section.

Read full topic

item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @akman15324 akman15324
item.description:
@akman15324 wrote:

Then Games zerker is an idiot -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Tony-Scape Owner Tony-Scape
item.description:
@Owner_Tony-Scape wrote:

I was tought to add customs into the models folder, then put the ints into class 8.
I downloaded the Games Pvp source and the owner lost his client, so he said use bluurs.
He gave the link to his models, and i downloaded them. they’re all ****.dat files.
No ints… How do i add it to bluurs client? Was he just being stupid ?
Do i rly need ints lol?[/quote]

YES, you do need ints, it doesn’t matter if you downloaded just the model. You need the ints. you don’t even need to download the model. You mostly only need the ints.

mod_lol1:

wrong section.

Read full topic
